author: Gregory Barber
title: What if Covid-19 Returns Every Year, Like the Common Cold?
description: A new Harvard study models how long we’d have to keep social distancing if the virus turns out to be seasonal, like its coronavirus cousins. It could be years.
content: The novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 is often compared to its close genetic cousin SARS-CoV-1. And for good reason: The virus responsible for the early 2000s SARS outbreak is, in many ways, the closest parallel to what were dealing with now. Researchers look to i… [+6650 chars]
